P

play() - Method in class fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.logic.TicTacToe
Runs the game loop, prompting the player for moves and updating the board.
Player - Class in fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.player
Represents a player with a specific symbol and color.
Player(String, int) - Constructor for class fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.player.Player
Creates a new player with the given symbol and number.
playerTurn(Player) - Method in class fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.logic.TicTacToe
Executes a single turn for the given player by prompting them for a move and displaying the chosen coordinates.
